allow: Bash(for file in docs/getting-started.html docs/examples.html docs/pricing.html docs/benefits.html docs/agentic-ai.html docs/faq.html)

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Production-ready deployment with advanced SEO optimization

🚀 Complete website optimization for production deployment:

SEO Enhancements:
- Advanced meta tags (title, description, keywords, canonical URLs) on all pages
- Open Graph tags for Facebook/LinkedIn sharing
- Twitter Card tags for rich preview
- JSON-LD structured data (SoftwareApplication, Organization, FAQPage)
- XML sitemap with all 8 pages
- Robots.txt for search engine crawling
- PWA manifest for mobile devices

Performance Optimization:
- HTTP headers for caching and security (_headers, .htaccess)
- Resource hints (preconnect, DNS-prefetch)
- Favicon and social media images generated
- Mobile-responsive and fast-loading design

Analytics & Monitoring:
- Analytics setup templates (GA4, Clarity, Plausible, Hotjar)
- Custom event tracking examples
- Ready for production deployment

Documentation:
- PRODUCTION_DEPLOYMENT.md - Complete deployment guide
- SEO_OPTIMIZATION_SUMMARY.md - Detailed optimization summary
- analytics-setup.html - Analytics implementation guide
- Updated README.md and CLAUDE.md

All pages optimized for search engines and ready for GitHub Pages deployment.

🤖 Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")

Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Fix pricing page and upgrade to premium pricing

✅ Fixed "View Detailed Pricing" link - now displays full pricing page
✅ Upgraded pricing to premium/professional positioning

Pricing Changes:
- Starter: $99/month (was $0.20/mo) - 50K touchpoints
- Professional: $299/month (was $1.50/mo) - 250K touchpoints
- Business: $799/month (was $105/mo) - 1M touchpoints
- Enterprise: $1,500+/month (custom pricing)

Positioning: Changed from "10-500x cheaper" to "60-75% more affordable"
- More sustainable business model
- Premium professional-grade positioning
- Still significantly more affordable than Windsor.ai, Northbeam, Rockerbox

docs/pricing.html:
- Added comprehensive pricing page with detailed feature comparison
- Competitor comparison table
- FAQ section for pricing questions
- 14-day free trial messaging
- Annual billing discount info

index.html:
- Updated pricing tiers
- Updated meta descriptions
- Updated JSON-LD structured data
- Updated features section

🤖 Generated with Claude Code (https://claude.com/claude-code)

Co-Authored-By: Claude <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
)")
